sources.title: Across the Plains (1939) JACK RANDALL
sources.description:
Stars: Jack Randall, Frank Yaconelli, Joyce Bryant
Director: Spencer Gordon Bennet

Two young brothers are separated when their wagon train is attacked and their parents killed. One brother is raised by Indians, and the other by the leader of an outlaw gang. Twenty years later they unknowingly meet again.

metadata.Plot: Two young brothers are separated when their wagon train is attacked and their parents killed. One brother Cherokee is raised by Indians and the other, the Kansas Kid, by the outlaw gang leader Buff. Twenty years later they unknowingly meet again when the Kid goes after wagons being guided by Cherokee.
metadata.Actors: Jack Randall, Rusty the Horse, Frank Yaconelli
